Scan Saver is Barcode Scanner Grocery Budgeting Mobile Application developed by the student researchers of Technological Institute of the Philippines (TIP) - Manila Campus that aims to help the customers to manage their budget real time and determine the cost of groceries of the customer\'s monthly and yearly spending.
